EmailTemplate.name: 01-27-22 BNK 62/64 Campaign Email 4.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: They’re here! Explore the new range of cash recyclers from NCR
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Meet the new SelfServTM 62 and 64 from NCR. A digital-first, versatile and future-proof range of cash recycling ATMs designed for today’s consumer. Featuring ultra-sleek modern design, these cash recycling ATMs are the future of self-service banking. Built with new capabilities and a digital-first interface, they unlock all the competitive advantages you need to wow your consumers. Check out the new NCR SelfServTM 62 and 64! ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
